title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: We're seeking a Machine Learning Engineer to join our AI research team. You'll work on cutting-edge ML projects, develop and deploy models, and collaborate with data scientists and product teams to bring AI solutions to market.
requirements: Master's degree in Computer Science, ML, or related field
Experience with ML frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit-learn)
Knowledge of MLOps and model deployment
Strong mathematical foundation in statistics and linear algebra
